name: Wedding Day!
description: The happiest day of their lives!
alt: Naomi and Erin holding hands, standing under their wedding arch.

name: Bouquet Toss
alt: Erin holding Naomi while she tosses the bouquet.

name: Lunch Date
description: A nice chance to get away from work together.
alt: Naomi and Erin sitting at a table, eating lunch together.

name: Dinner
description: Erin loves cooking for Naomi, who loves eating her food!
alt: Naomi sitting at the counter eating the food Erin is serving her.

name: Endless Love
alt: Naomi and Erin making a heart with their hands.

name: Summer Day
description: Sometimes just laying in the grass together makes the best date.
alt: Naomi and Erin laying in the grass together, holding hands.

name: Welcome Home~!
description: Naomi loves coming home from work to Erin's warm embrace.
alt: Erin lifting Naomi up in her arms.

name: A Night Out
alt: Naomi and Erin standing on a rooftop, striking a pose.

name: First Kiss
description: A moment they will never forget.

name: Relaxing in the Park
description: Naomi likes to make sure Erin gets to relax too.
alt: Naomi sitting below a tree, Erin resting her head on Naomi's lap.

name: Surprise Visit
description: Nothing beats an unexpected encounter with your beloved.
alt: Naomi jumping on Erin from behind, surprising her.

name: Dojo Session
description: Sometimes the best way to unwind is with some swordplay.
alt: Naomi and Erin in a dojo, facing each other with bokken.

name: Proposal
alt: Naomi on her knees presenting a ring to Erin.
